tool_description: Spotify APIs. Search artirt, album, track ...
name: Spotify APIs
title: Spotify APIs

api_list.name: Get Album Tracks
api_list.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an album’s tracks. Optional parameters can be used to limit the number of tracks returned.

api_list.name: Get Artist's Top Tracks
api_list.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's top tracks by country.

api_list.name: Get Artist's Albums
api_list.description: Get Spotify catalog information about an artist's albums.

api_list.name: Search for Item
api_list.description: Get Spotify catalog information about albums, artists, playlists, tracks, shows, episodes or audiobooks that match a keyword string.
